Fox News Watch Saturday 2:30 p et Indiana Congressman Mike Pence will not run for president in 2012. In a letter to supporters he writes; In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.
